__TOC__

** We had our Lucid Lynx Release Party on the 2nd of May. We first had a <nowiki>[[ http:--geeknic.org | Geeknic ]]</nowiki> in <nowiki>[[ http:--www.farmleigh.ie-Events-Title,12875,en.html | Farmleigh Park]]</nowiki> and then went on to the <nowiki>[[ http:--www.bullandcastle.ie-bullcastle-home.html | Bull and Castle]]</nowiki> for drinks. Some <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/rorymccann/sets/72157623978289630/ | photos ]]</nowiki>.

** Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2010-05-19|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 19th May 2010.

** The date has been set for our next <nowiki>[[http://www.ossbarcamp.com/| OSSBarcamp]]</nowiki> 25-26th September 2010 planing is under way.

** A member of our loco <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/czajkowski | czajkowski]]</nowiki> headed off to UDS-M.
  
** Well done to Orla O'Donohue, who won the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Events/Competitions/WorldPlayDay |1st Annual Ubuntu Women World Play Day Competition]]</nowiki> with her <nowiki>[[http://elkbuntu.net/ubuntuwomen/pics/full/orla_odonohue.JPG |  photo]]</nowiki>.

** We had a lively <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Hour| Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> on the 26th of May at 6pm  at the <nowiki>[[http://www.trinitycapitalhotel.com/ | Trinity Capital Hotel bar]]</nowiki>. We handed out Ubuntu cd's and talked about the loco directory.
